title: The state of bruisers is really fucking retarded
body:
50 minute game. My team has two bruisers, two carries, and Zyra support (basically three carries). Enemy team has three bruisers, one carry, and Lulu. Everyone is full build.

Team fights are literally just the bruisers barreling into the other team's carries and almost instantly killing them, except the enemy team has more bruisers, so they kill three of our team near instantly, and we kill two of their team near instantly, leaving us to automatically lose because it's 2v3.

This is stupid as fuck and in no way healthy game play. There's zero thought to this bullshit. We can't defend our carries from their bruisers, and they can't defend theirs from ours.

replies.body:
Sounds like improper positioning to me. Most beuisers are fairly immoble so kiting makes you basically invincible to them. Not to mention the zyra snare and ult.

Sounds like they won due to skill, not team build.

You have no idea what you're talking about.

If bruisers "running at you" is an issue for you then your positioning is way worse than I thought. I am sorry, I did not realize you just started the game. I mean, Lee Sin has two jumps that can be an issue for you and his ult can kick you into the enemy team if you are in a poor position or bad at dodging skillshots, but if he is just running at you then you should be orb walking. Attack him, step back, attack him, step back. Use a movement skill if he gets too close.

Secondly, I am no Challenger or pro MLG MVP, but I at least know each fight has more factors (teamplay, positioning and individual champion kits already being 3) than just "who has more people of X", ESPECIALLY in high elo (though prob not in pro scene). What can I say? Your bias is clearly showing there nicely. Obviously you use the example because if merely favours your argument, and you purpose only stay on the highest level just so you could push it.
